PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-10282017-07-14,  ,  ,  ,  PCH
ActCanadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission Act
PrecisAppointment of CHRISTIANNE M. LAIZNER of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a full-time member and Vice-Chairperson of the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission on an interim basis, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of one year effective July 17, 2017.
